TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ECDsaCng extends System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa
Public NotInheritable Class ECDsaCng Inherits ECDsa
public ref class ECDsaCng sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::ECDsa

summary.span: 提供橢圓曲線數位簽章演算法 (ECDSA) 的新一代密碼編譯 (CNG) 實作。

span.span: Provides a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) implementation of the Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別衍生自抽象基底類別。This class derives from the abstract base class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別，以簽署訊息，以及如何使用簽章來確認訊息未被改變。The following example shows how to use the class to sign a message and how to use the signature to verify that the message has not been altered. [!code-csharp[ECDsaCng#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ecdsacng/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ECDsaCng#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ecdsacng/vb/program.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 使用隨機金鑰組，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a random key pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 隨機金鑰組有 521 位元的公開金鑰長度。The random key pair has a public key length of 521 bits.

exception.span: 這個系統不支援新一代密碼編譯 (CNG) 類別。

span.span: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) classes are not supported on this system.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，其公開/私密金鑰組是在指定的曲線上所產生。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class whose public/private key pair is generated over the specified curve.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `curve` 必須驗證 (也就是它必須傳回`true`) 時傳遞至方法，而且必須是具名或明確的質數。`curve` must validate (that is, it must return `true`) when passed to the method and must be either a named or explicit prime.

span.span: does not validate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性接受下列演算法： ， ， ， ，和。This property accepts the following algorithms: , , , , and . 也可能使用其他自訂的雜湊演算法。Other custom hash algorithms may also be used. 預設的演算法是。The default algorithm is . 如果您要簽署或驗證已進行雜湊的資料，不會使用這個屬性。This property is not used if you are signing or verifying data that is already hashed.

span.span: Replaces the existing key that the current instance is working with by creating a new for the parameters structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`parameters`僅包含，只會匯入的公開金鑰。If `parameters` contains only , only a public key is imported. 如果`parameters`也包含，匯入完整金鑰組。If `parameters` also contains , a full key pair is imported. 欄位會指定要匯入的曲線類型。The field specifies the type of the curve to import.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會指定資料的簽章產生的雜湊輸入的資料使用屬性，然後再簽章結果。This method generates a signature for the specified data by hashing the input data using the property, and then signing the result. 旗標便須指定 Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) 金鑰不隨機產生物件。The flag is required if the Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) key is not randomly generated by the object.
